sentences.en: " I prefer a build - in zoom lens , like the one I have. "
sentences.cn: 我喜欢如我所有的那种固定式 变焦镜头.

sentences.en: Brenda jumped in the car and zoomed off.
sentences.cn: 布伦达跳上汽车，疾驰而去。

sentences.en: Compare zoom, whiz, zip, shoot, dart, and nip.
sentences.cn: 试比较zoom 、 whiz 、 zip 、 shoot 、 dart 、 nip这几个动词.

sentences.en: Film the whole building first, then zoom in on the door.
sentences.cn: 首先拍整个大楼, 然后把镜头推向大门.

sentences.en: It has a built - in zoom lens as well.
sentences.cn: 它也有内 置 的变焦镜头.

sentences.en: Scientists can also ask the computer to zoom in on certain small areas of the picture.
sentences.cn: 科学家还能要计算机很快移向图片上某些小区域内.

sentences.en: The airplane's zoom carried it above the clouds.
sentences.cn: 飞机的陡直上升使它飞到云层之上.

sentences.en: The camera doesnt zoom or tilt or rotate, its a fixed camera.
sentences.cn: 再次强调,视角不会拉伸,不会倾斜,不会旋转, 它是固定的.

sentences.en: This indicates the business in home will spread out a ZOOM in the round.
sentences.cn: 这标志着ZOOM在国内的业务将全面展开.

sentences.en: We could hear the constant zoom of the cars on the highway.
sentences.cn: 我们能听到公路上汽车不断发出的嗡嗡声.

sentences.en: You may use a zoom or telephoto lens on your camera.
sentences.cn: 你可以在照相机上安装可变距镜头或摄远镜头.

sentences.en: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.cn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。

sentences.en: Zoom and whiz are both informal and indicate the rapid noisy movement of a vehicle, etc.
sentences.cn: zoom与whiz均为口语用词, 指车等快速行驶同时发出声响.

sentences.en: Zoom in on areas of interest. Save and restore trace data.
sentences.cn: 可以缩放感兴趣的区域, 保存及重建回溯数据.

sentences.en: Zoom, zoom, zoom! Give me room! Hear my motor roaring by.
sentences.cn: 嗡, 嗡, 嗡! 给我空间! 听我的发动机咆哮着来了.

sentences.en: Zoom: Sorry. This is my computer! That is your computer.
sentences.cn: 对不起. 这是我的电脑. 那是你的电脑.

words.tran_cn: 急速上升；嗡嗡声；[摄]变焦摄影

phrases.tran_cn: 镜头的拉近/推远,聚焦于

trans.tran_en: a sound made by a vehicle that is travelling fast

trans.tran_cn: 急速移动；急升， 猛涨
